message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking $20,000 for it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer.  While I'm motivated to sell, that price point doesn't reflect the true value of this product.  Would you be willing to meet me at $17,000?
I understand that you're motivated to sell, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,000 and $17,000, which would be $14,500. Can you consider that?
